snippet: The rich in America - many of whom backed Barack Obama in 2008 - have turned against the president this year, despite the fact that banks received the biggest government bailout of all.
abstract: The rich in America - many of whom backed Barack Obama in 2008 - have turned against the president this year, despite the fact that banks received the biggest government bailout of all.

headline.main: Explaining Why Wall Street and the Wealthy Hate Obama
